programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: What items should a novice cat owner prepare to welcome their cat home? Recommendation of the best breeds for beginners among all cute cats! Eat like a champion cat by following healthy recipes we reveal! Dont be afraid if you have a destructive cat at home, a trainer will help you understand your cats out-of-control behavior, Angelic Cat Training Class has begin! When the owner goes on a trip, felines will have a great vacation at the cat hotel!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: A lone cow has gone wild and escaped into a neighbouring field.Dr. Matt has been called in to lend a hand. The heifer " went wild" two months ago and various tactics are employed to get Matt close enough to get a good shot with his dart gun. But the wary cow wins the first round and escapes. Matt decides to return another day.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In The Wirral, Inspector Anthony Joynes is called out to a shocking case where nine year old German Shepherd Reo has been left with an awful skin condition. Despite scratching so much that her face is covered in open sores she is still able to muster a wag of the tail, but will she have the strength to overcome her painful condition?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Dogs are mans most loyal friends. Their well-behaved and cute appearance is very soothing to our hearts. Thats why many people choose dogs to company with their family! There are many choices for companion dogs, but todays cute pet have well-developed muscles and a fierce look on their faces. But in fact, they love to act cute, making the contrast between their personality and appearance is extremely cute!nTodays Cute Pet Coming is going to subvert everyones impression on them! Follow us and get to know bulldogs with a fierce face and gentle heart!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: A lone cow has gone wild and escaped into a neighbouring field.Dr. Matt has been called in to lend a hand. The heifer " went wild" two months ago and various tactics are employed to get Matt close enough to get a good shot with his dart gun. But the wary cow wins the first round and escapes. Matt decides to return another day.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In The Wirral, Inspector Anthony Joynes is called out to a shocking case where nine year old German Shepherd Reo has been left with an awful skin condition. Despite scratching so much that her face is covered in open sores she is still able to muster a wag of the tail, but will she have the strength to overcome her painful condition?

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt pays his weekly visit to Flamingoland, near Malton in North Yorkshire, and is called to inspect a new arrival, a male Asian Sarus Crane brought in as company to a resident female. They are an endangered species but the cranes havent yet warmed to each other and Matt offers advice.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Cathy Hyde is on a warrant to access a property in Leigh, suspected of being involved in puppy trafficking. Cathy discovers two Jack Russell types and two Yorkshire Terriers. Tragically, they were too late one for one dog that had passed away and another has badly fractured leg. Will Cathy be able to provide the escape that these dogs desperately need?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The Japanese animated film My Neighbor Totoro, which is popular all over the world is the childhood memory of many. Totoros classic furry body, round eyes and cute expression are very endearing. In South America, there is a kind of chinchilla that looks very similar to Totoro in the film. I heard that Taiwan now allows legal imports of these animals for breeding! Today, lets follow the Totoro zoo owner Molly and fall in love with the soft and cute charm of this animation star!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve got monkey criminals, magic and mirrors, cheeky monkeys, monkey pals, banana loving primates, baby monkeys, monkeys vs cameras, monkeys out on the town, and monkeys acting like us humans.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Early morning at the Brash household and Dr. Matt and his wife Clare, a horse vet, with their children enjoy a traditional English breakfast - on a traditional Dales day. Theyre off to the Malton Show. Its been an annual event for over a century, a chance for local people to meet and compete for prizes with their finest produce. In a rural community, vets are crucial. Matt started as a farm vet before specialising in exotic animals. The show also gives him an opportunity to keep in touch with livestock.

programme.desc: New popular pets of the dark world have all "crawled" out and gathered together?! Dark cuisines made from insects can also taste delicious?! Eye-opening! programme.title: Jerkin and GRILLIN
programme.desc: Back from a trip to Negril, Jamaica, chef Derrell Smith brings his favorite dishes back to his own yard! Grillin up Jerk Chicken, Saltfish and Ackee, coconut peas and rice and other Caribbean favorites for his two friends.

programme.title: Happy Birthday to Me
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smiths birthday and hes treating himself to some self love and a lavish steak dinner inspired by a famous NYC steakhouse. On the menu: Rib Eye Steak with Peppercorn Sauce, Duck Frites, Wedge Salad and a celebratory carrot cake.

programme.title: Brunch Grows Up
programme.desc: Enough with the endless lines and mimosas! Chef Derrell Smith has leveled up his brunch by hosting his own. Todays menu, a "yelluh" grit bowl bar with toppings; Beer Braised Pulled Pork, Chili Fried Eggs, Bang Bang Shrimp and Tajin-rimmed Palomas.

programme.title: Grandma Estelle
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smiths grandma inspired him in life and in the kitchen. He shares family recipes taking him right back to grandmas table. Hes cookin up Fried Chicken, Mac N Cheese, Collard Green Slaw, Brlee Banana Pudding and Pop-pops moonshine.

programme.title: Farmers Market Finds
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith heads to the Farmers Market for the first time. Inspired by rows of fresh fruit, veggies and the local farmers he creates a flavorful meal like Veggie Focaccia, Mushroom Medley Pasta, Spiced Apple Cobbler and a crisp white Sangria.

programme.title: A South Carolina Family Reunion
programme.desc: For his reunion inspired menu Chef Derrell Smith is going back to his roots. Cookin up some modern takes on the family classics including his Garlic Pesto Potato Salad, Salmon Filet, a Herby, Spicy Kale Slaw, and Grilled Fruit Skewers.

programme.title: Pre-Gaming!
programme.desc: As a former NFL player, game days hit a little different. These days chef Derrell Smith isnt on the field, hes changing the game in the kitchen with eats like Philly Cheesesteak Taquitos, Oyster Mushroom Wings and Elote Queso with Chili Lime Chips.

programme.title: Dinner Party
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is hosting a dinner party! Living in KoreaTown, Derrell has fallen in love with its food and culture. Tonight, hes servin up Braised Beef Short Rib with Crispy Rice Cakes, Pickled Cabbage, Glass Noodles Salad and Korean Pancakes.

programme.title: Thankful For Everything
programme.desc: Thanksgiving is here and Chef Derrell Smith is serving up herb cornish hens, cornbread stuffing and cranberry sauce for his main meal. His solo meal is tostones with broccolini and his mystery meal will be filled with traditional holiday favorites.

programme.title: Take-out at Home
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is tackling his favorite take-out foods at home, serving up Chinese American menu staples with General Tsos chicken, bok choy and delicious egg rolls. His mystery meal will hopefully be restaurant worthy and packed with flavors.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni And pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella And chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her moms recipes as well as some of her own. Shell whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: Moroccan Lamb with Sangria, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill welcomes the coziness of fall with some fabulous flavors And dishes including Moroccan lamb with dates And harissa, fall sangria with apples And amaretto, garlicky rice pilaf, roasted root vegetables, and crispy cucumber salad. Its fall yall!

programme.title: Doing Brunch Right, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill brings big brunch vibes with her favorite weekend dishes including NY-style bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with black pepper bacon, Maryland-style Old Bay crab cake benedict, coquito French toast bites, and a berry-ful Aperol spritz!

programme.title: Tacos and Margaritas, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill hosts a heavenly girls night in, complete with sweet potato tacos with roasted corn salsa, carne asada tacos with orange And spice, and crab and shrimp enchiladas with chili verde. She tops it all off with a fabulous margarita station.

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Meals Under $7
programme.desc: At a loss when your pantry is empty? With these recipes, you can walk into any grocery store with only $7 and walk out with everything you need for an entire meal. Because yes, you can whip up a nutritious meal at an affordable price!

programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Jerkin and GRILLIN
programme.desc: Back from a trip to Negril, Jamaica, chef Derrell Smith brings his favorite dishes back to his own yard! Grillin up Jerk Chicken, Saltfish and Ackee, coconut peas and rice and other Caribbean favorites for his two friends.

programme.title: Happy Birthday to Me
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smiths birthday and hes treating himself to some self love and a lavish steak dinner inspired by a famous NYC steakhouse. On the menu: Rib Eye Steak with Peppercorn Sauce, Duck Frites, Wedge Salad and a celebratory carrot cake.

programme.title: Brunch Grows Up
programme.desc: Enough with the endless lines and mimosas! Chef Derrell Smith has leveled up his brunch by hosting his own. Todays menu, a "yelluh" grit bowl bar with toppings; Beer Braised Pulled Pork, Chili Fried Eggs, Bang Bang Shrimp and Tajin-rimmed Palomas.

programme.title: Grandma Estelle
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smiths grandma inspired him in life and in the kitchen. He shares family recipes taking him right back to grandmas table. Hes cookin up Fried Chicken, Mac N Cheese, Collard Green Slaw, Brlee Banana Pudding and Pop-pops moonshine.

programme.title: Farmers Market Finds
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith heads to the Farmers Market for the first time. Inspired by rows of fresh fruit, veggies and the local farmers he creates a flavorful meal like Veggie Focaccia, Mushroom Medley Pasta, Spiced Apple Cobbler and a crisp white Sangria.

programme.title: A South Carolina Family Reunion
programme.desc: For his reunion inspired menu Chef Derrell Smith is going back to his roots. Cookin up some modern takes on the family classics including his Garlic Pesto Potato Salad, Salmon Filet, a Herby, Spicy Kale Slaw, and Grilled Fruit Skewers.

programme.title: Pre-Gaming!
programme.desc: As a former NFL player, game days hit a little different. These days chef Derrell Smith isnt on the field, hes changing the game in the kitchen with eats like Philly Cheesesteak Taquitos, Oyster Mushroom Wings and Elote Queso with Chili Lime Chips.

programme.title: Dinner Party
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is hosting a dinner party! Living in KoreaTown, Derrell has fallen in love with its food and culture. Tonight, hes servin up Braised Beef Short Rib with Crispy Rice Cakes, Pickled Cabbage, Glass Noodles Salad and Korean Pancakes.

programme.title: Pizza Slice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill throws a pizza party with her delicious homemade pies! She creates a sweet and savory pie with spicy pepperoni And pineapple, a tangy BBQ chicken pizza, a grandma deep dish pie with mozzarella And chorizo, and an herby salad flatbread.

programme.title: Plantains and Rice, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month with her moms recipes as well as some of her own. Shell whip up a coconut coquito cocktail, Cuban-style black beans, a garlicky arroz con pollo with sofrito, and some salty and sweet plantains.

programme.title: One Pot Meals
programme.desc: Any true struggle cook knows theres nothing better than a one pot dinner. Not only is there hardly any cleanup at the end, but the prep is minimal too, which means hunger satisfaction is imminent. Who says meals cant be cheap, easy and delicious?

programme.title: Eat Your Greens
programme.desc: Going green isnt just a trend; its a no-brainer! When the veggies are in season and the prices are at their lowest, Frankies colorful recipes and zero waste tips will have you celebrating the savings with fresh spring produce.

programme.title: Homemade-ish
programme.desc: Last minute company leaving you in a pinch? Frankie has you covered with these easy recipes featuring store bought staples. With a few Struggle tips, these basic ingredients can be transformed into dishes that will impress your guests.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Soak up summer with the ultimate outdoor cookout, featuring smashburgers, pasta salad and scrumptious sweets. These classic dishes can be prepared indoors or out, making them the perfect recipes for backyard dinner parties on warm summer nights.

programme.title: Pre-Gaming!

programme.title: Dinner Party
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is hosting a dinner party! Living in KoreaTown, Derrell has fallen in love with its food and culture. Tonight, hes servin up Braised Beef Short Rib with Crispy Rice Cakes, Pickled Cabbage, Glass Noodles Salad and Korean Pancakes.

programme.title: Thankful For Everything
programme.desc: Thanksgiving is here and Chef Derrell Smith is serving up herb cornish hens, cornbread stuffing and cranberry sauce for his main meal. His solo meal is tostones with broccolini and his mystery meal will be filled with traditional holiday favorites.

programme.title: Take-out at Home
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is tackling his favorite take-out foods at home, serving up Chinese American menu staples with General Tsos chicken, bok choy and delicious egg rolls. His mystery meal will hopefully be restaurant worthy and packed with flavors.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.desc: In a city with over 60 Michelin star restaurants, one brother will live and dine like a king, while the other will check out the citys more affordable street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lions Share of Lyon
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italys Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.desc: Saksikan acara kemuncak industri filem Malaysia yang menghargai dan menilai mutu kerja filem sepanjang tahun dalam siaran Langsung Festival Filem Malaysia.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night
programme.desc: Rancangan hiburan di mana, ahli-ahli mengambil bahagian dalam beberapa misi untuk menjadi pemenang di akhir perlumbaan. Para peserta cuba untuk mengelakkan hukuman atau berusaha untuk memenangi hadiah.

programme.title: Sanggar Cinta Raudhah
programme.desc: Kisah ketabahan Raudhah yang menjalani kehidupan selepas kematian suami selain terpaksa memikul tanggungjawab menguruskan syarikat peninggalan arwah suaminya.

programme.title: Issandra
programme.desc: Mengisahkan mengenai kemelut hidup yang dihadapi oleh gadis bernama Issandra (18 tahun) dalam mencari semula abang kandungnya, Irfan yang sama-sama pernah membesar di rumah anak-anak yatim.

programme.title: Kaaval
programme.desc: Drama kepolisan mengisahkan usaha pihak polis dalam memerangi pelbagai jenis jenayah.

programme.title: 19th Street
programme.desc: Kisah empat sahabat yang mengharungi pelbagai pengalaman pahit manis, berhadapan dengan keadaan yang terdesak sehingga terlibat dalam jenayah serta kisah cinta yang menyulami kehidupan mereka.

programme.title: Jangan Ambil Kerja Tuhan
programme.desc: Drama kemasyarakatan yang memaparkan hubungan kekeluargaan, persahabatan dan percintaan.

programme.title: Istimewa Bersama (Ramlah Ram)
programme.desc: Saksikan kembali persembahan istimewa Ramlah Ram dalam konsert terbitan Unit Hiburan TV, RTM.

programme.title: Sanggar Cinta Raudhah
programme.desc: Kisah ketabahan Raudhah yang menjalani kehidupan selepas kematian suami selain terpaksa memikul tanggungjawab menguruskan syarikat peninggalan arwah suaminya.

programme.title: CJ the DJ
programme.desc: Animasi yang mengisahkan CJ, seorang remaja yang gemarkan muzik.

programme.title: Adi Genius
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Adi, seorang anak yatim piatu bijak dan kreatif dalam pengunaan komputer.

programme.title: Pendekar Lima
programme.desc: Animasi yang mengisahkan 5 remaja dari lima 5 bangsa di Malaysia yang memiliki kebolehan seni pertahanan diri berbeza.

programme.title: Sumo Mouse
programme.desc: Kisah seekor kucing bernama Yama yang mempunyai kuasa hebat yang mampu menukarkannya kepada Sumo Mouse.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic kembali ke New Yoke City dan bekerja sama dengan Tails Nine, versi alternatif Tails yang jenius namun memiliki agenda sendiri. Sementara itu, Sonic mulai merasakan efek dari berpindah antara dimensi.

programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic head-to-toe plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E092
programme.desc: Victoria aclara a Nicols que fue el quien encontro un camino propio junto a Florencia por lo que debe dejarla tranquila; ambos jovenes discuten sobre sus sentimientos hasta que Hilario llega exigiendole a Del Casal que deje tranquila a su hija; al quedarse a solas, el seor Guanipa intenta acercarse a Victoria reconociendo sus errores; pero la joven, que se mantiene inmutable, no cede ante su padre. Hansen se ha encerrado en su casa sumergido en la tristeza que le dejo el rompimiento con Adelaida; quien, a su vez, tampoco puede dejar de pensar en el empresario. Joselo, que se ha convertido en el ayudante de Victoria, aconseja a la muchacha que no repita ante nadie que se quiere quedar con Cantarrana, pues Hilario ha ganado muchos enemigos y alguno pudiera matarlo para despues echarle la culpa a ella; la joven decide viajar a Cantarrana de inmediato.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E102
programme.desc: Camila para hacer vivir a Patricia la misma angustia que debio sentir su madre; le ofrecer ayuda y luego la expondr pblicamente. Camila, posee el video grabado de lo ocurrido con Celso y la condicion para no entregarlo a la polica es que Fausto cuente como fue que incriminaron a su mam.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E103
programme.desc: Camila ofrece a Patricia entregar el video, solo si traiciona a Fausto y lo entrega a la polica. Patricia dice a Camila que su mam no era tan santa y que fue la causante de esta guerra entre las familias, por su relacion con dos hombres a la vez. Fausto, contrata nuevamente a Anton para que mate a su esposa.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E01
programme.desc: Clara Ines se defiende por haberse escapado, su nica intencion era buscar a su familia, los Santa Mara, noticia que sorprende a Valandro.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E02
programme.desc: Clara desea que los Santa Mara la acepten para cumplir con su sueo de tener una verdadera familia

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E02
programme.desc: Guillermo tells Lorena that if she does not kill Marco Aurelio Corona, she will never see her son again. Lorena returns to Lucas and informs him that she was unable to kill him. As fate would have it, Lorena and Alberto meet again. Alberto is shocked to recognize Lorena and wonders how she ended up being his fathers personal nurse.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E98
programme.desc: Carlos Ral deja en claro a Santiago que ellos no estn celebrando, pero al ver que Adriana est acompaando al abogado no puede controlar sus celos.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E99
programme.desc: Cesar Romn desea felicidad a los nuevos esposos, pero Santiago -la nota discordante- al brindar por una felicidad que dure hasta que Salvatore Perroni los destruya en el juicio.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E100
programme.desc: Cesar Romn tiene su programa de cocina, pero en pnico durante la primera transmision, Mam Juana sorprende a todos al tomar la conduccion del programa.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E092
programme.desc: Victoria aclara a Nicols que fue el quien encontro un camino propio junto a Florencia por lo que debe dejarla tranquila; ambos jovenes discuten sobre sus sentimientos hasta que Hilario llega exigiendole a Del Casal que deje tranquila a su hija; al quedarse a solas, el seor Guanipa intenta acercarse a Victoria reconociendo sus errores; pero la joven, que se mantiene inmutable, no cede ante su padre. Hansen se ha encerrado en su casa sumergido en la tristeza que le dejo el rompimiento con Adelaida; quien, a su vez, tampoco puede dejar de pensar en el empresario. Joselo, que se ha convertido en el ayudante de Victoria, aconseja a la muchacha que no repita ante nadie que se quiere quedar con Cantarrana, pues Hilario ha ganado muchos enemigos y alguno pudiera matarlo para despues echarle la culpa a ella; la joven decide viajar a Cantarrana de inmediato.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E093
programme.desc: Hilario acusa sorpresa cuando Victoria le revela que, ya que el est empeado en caerse, ser ella misma quien lo termine de tumbar quitndole Cantarrana; el seor Guanipa se conmueve cuando su hija, con lgrimas, le reprocha que se comporte como si se quisiera morir e intenta tranquilizarla asegurndole que no va a perder la hacienda como todos creen; sin embargo, sus argumentos no son vlidos para Victoria, quien le advierte que le llego el momento de que acepte que ahora ella es ms fuerte que el. La sorpresa se apodera de Adelaida cuando uno de los acreedores de Hilario la visita para proponerle que el se puede encargar de matar a Guanipa siempre y cuando ella se comprometa a que, una vez que quede viuda, pagar todas las deudas del hombre; la seora ordena a Moncho saque al hombre de su casa pues, aunque odia a Hilario, no va a prestarse para que lo maten. Ya en la recepcion del matrimonio, Fernanda se tensa cuando Caravaggio, algo pasado de tragos, comenta ante Leopoldo que esa boda, al igual que la de Nicols con Florencia, es un error; el seor Alcoy quiere una explicacion de sus palabras, pero el periodista sugiere le pregunte directamente a Nicols a que se refera cuando le dijo a Victoria que Clementina tuvo ms valenta que ellos dos.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E103
programme.desc: Camila ofrece a Patricia entregar el video, solo si traiciona a Fausto y lo entrega a la polica. Patricia dice a Camila que su mam no era tan santa y que fue la causante de esta guerra entre las familias, por su relacion con dos hombres a la vez. Fausto, contrata nuevamente a Anton para que mate a su esposa.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E104
programme.desc: Fausto y Ezequiel enfrentados; el video que proyecta la muerte de Celso hundir a Fausto a menos que firme una confesion donde aclare que Rosa Blanco fue condenada injustamente. Fausto manipula diciendo que tambien Ezequiel confiese que mato a su hermano Augusto, el pap de Camila. Ella llega a tiempo para impedir que Ezequiel le dispare a Fausto.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E02
programme.desc: Clara desea que los Santa Mara la acepten para cumplir con su sueo de tener una verdadera familia

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E03
programme.desc: Clara necesita saber si es una Santa Maria; situacion que afecta a Ral, pues le ha mentido a su amada con la ayuda de sus amigos.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E03
programme.desc: Claudio gives instructions to Pedro about the new plan to kill his brother. In an attempt to recover the million dollars that a third party collected with the stolen check, Ricardo and Paulina go before the bank manager who confirms that the operation was clean and cannot be reversed. Lorena receives a package from her husband.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E04
programme.desc: Gertrudis plots a mass shooting for the party. Alberto is caught up in memories of the past, including a letter where Lorenita declared her love for him. At the Oceanography Institute, Isabel surprises Malena with a bouquet of flowers as a show of admiration for her new appointment. Guillermo warns Lorena of the danger her son faces for having fled the Corona household without killing Marco Aurelio.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E01
programme.desc: En cuanto Palacios decide confesar lo que hizo con su sopa, Cesar Romn la declara como la ganadora indiscutible del concurso.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E093
programme.desc: Hilario acusa sorpresa cuando Victoria le revela que, ya que el est empeado en caerse, ser ella misma quien lo termine de tumbar quitndole Cantarrana; el seor Guanipa se conmueve cuando su hija, con lgrimas, le reprocha que se comporte como si se quisiera morir e intenta tranquilizarla asegurndole que no va a perder la hacienda como todos creen; sin embargo, sus argumentos no son vlidos para Victoria, quien le advierte que le llego el momento de que acepte que ahora ella es ms fuerte que el. programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E094
programme.desc: Sergio, que entiende la urgencia de Victoria por ir a Cantarrana para estar con sus padres, acepta acompaarla con la excusa de que lo hace por proteger su inversion. Hilario no quiere que Victoria se presente en la hacienda porque teme que sus acreedores aprovechen su presencia para presionarlo an ms; Adelaida, que cree que al hombre solo le importa su propia suerte, le advierte que si algo llega a pasarle a su hija por su culpa, ser ella misma quien se encargue de hacerlo pagar por eso. Fernanda no puede evitar el llanto cuando Leopoldo, al sorprender su conversacion con Nicols, descubre que fue ella quien obligo a su sobrino a casarse con Florencia. La sorpresa se apodera de Hilario cuando Victoria y Sergio ofrecen comprarle el sesenta por cierto de Cantarrana; el seor se niega a aceptar, pero su hija trata de hacerle ver que no le queda otra opcion ms digna que esa si quiere evitar que el trabajo de toda su vida vaya a dar a manos de sus acreedores de juego. Los nervios invaden a Victoria cuando Sergio le deja entrever que est sintiendo por ella una atraccion que va ms all de su relacion laboral; sin embargo, Escalante no se atreve a seguir adelante porque la joven Guanipa lo corta aclarando que lo nico que a ellos los une son los negocios.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E104
programme.desc: Fausto y Ezequiel enfrentados; el video que proyecta la muerte de Celso hundir a Fausto a menos que firme una confesion donde aclare que Rosa Blanco fue condenada injustamente. Fausto manipula diciendo que tambien Ezequiel confiese que mato a su hermano Augusto, el pap de Camila. Ella llega a tiempo para impedir que Ezequiel le dispare a Fausto.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E105
programme.desc: En medio de la subasta de arte, el matrimonio Del Casal tiene un furtivo encuentro con Victoria y Sergio; Florencia cree que a Victoria le enfurece verla con su amado Nicols, pero Victoria le aclara que Nicols solo est con ella por compromiso y nada ms. A Cantarrana se presenta Carlos Hansen para proponerle un trato a Hilario: se mudar a otro pas con Adelaida s Guanipa firma el divorcio; Hilario no est dispuesto a aceptar sin dar la pelea. Fernanda ha tomado la decision de enviar a su hija Eugenia a un internado suizo, pues la mala influencia de Yosmir es lo que ha ocasionado las actitudes rebeldes de la chica. Despues de haber firmado el divorcio, Adelaida es feliz porque ahora podr rehacer su vida al lado de Hansen, quien le hace saber que debern mudarse para cumplir con Hilario.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E03
programme.desc: Clara necesita saber si es una Santa Maria; situacion que afecta a Ral, pues le ha mentido a su amada con la ayuda de sus amigos.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E04
programme.desc: Edilio presenta a Clara y a su madre, Albornoz no cree que la mujer sea Pastora Lara, afirmando que conocio a la verdadera mam de Ral.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E04

Guillermo warns Lorena of the danger her son faces for having fled the Corona household without killing Marco Aurelio.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E05
programme.desc: Lorena tries to send Alberto away, but he only seeks to break the ice and plays alluding to his childhood loves; provoking even more anger and jealousy in Guillermo, who remains threatening - Ricardo decides to hire the electrician services of Mara Bonita Echeverri, as a way to approach one of the four suspects with the same last name Echeverri of the theft of the check.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E04
programme.desc: Edilio presenta a Clara y a su madre, Albornoz no cree que la mujer sea Pastora Lara, afirmando que conocio a la verdadera mam de Ral.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E04
programme.desc: Gertrudis plots a mass shooting for the party. Alberto is caught up in memories of the past, including a letter where Lorenita declared her love for him. At the Oceanography Institute, Isabel surprises Malena with a bouquet of flowers as a show of admiration for her new appointment. Guillermo warns Lorena of the danger her son faces for having fled the Corona household without killing Marco Aurelio.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E05
programme.desc: Lorena tries to send Alberto away, but he only seeks to break the ice and plays alluding to his childhood loves; provoking even more anger and jealousy in Guillermo, who remains threatening - Ricardo decides to hire the electrician services of Mara Bonita Echeverri, as a way to approach one of the four suspects with the same last name Echeverri of the theft of the check.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E100
programme.desc: Cesar Romn tiene su programa de cocina, pero en pnico durante la primera transmision, Mam Juana sorprende a todos al tomar la conduccion del programa.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E01
programme.desc: En cuanto Palacios decide confesar lo que hizo con su sopa, Cesar Romn la declara como la ganadora indiscutible del concurso.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E093
programme.desc: Hilario acusa sorpresa cuando Victoria le revela que, ya que el est empeado en caerse, ser ella misma quien lo termine de tumbar quitndole Cantarrana; el seor Guanipa se conmueve cuando su hija, con lgrimas, le reprocha que se comporte como si se quisiera morir e intenta tranquilizarla asegurndole que no va a perder la hacienda como todos creen; sin embargo, sus argumentos no son vlidos para Victoria, quien le advierte que le llego el momento de que acepte que ahora ella es ms fuerte que el. La sorpresa se apodera de Adelaida cuando uno de los acreedores de Hilario la visita para proponerle que el se puede encargar de matar a Guanipa siempre y cuando ella se comprometa a que, una vez que quede viuda, pagar todas las deudas del hombre; la seora ordena a Moncho saque al hombre de su casa pues, aunque odia a Hilario, no va a prestarse para que lo maten. Ya en la recepcion del matrimonio, Fernanda se tensa cuando Caravaggio, algo pasado de tragos, comenta ante Leopoldo que esa boda, al igual que la de Nicols con Florencia, es un error; el seor Alcoy quiere una explicacion de sus palabras, pero el periodista sugiere le pregunte directamente a Nicols a que se refera cuando le dijo a Victoria que Clementina tuvo ms valenta que ellos dos.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E10 - Reca
programme.desc: Dive deep into the season of Dropped as the brothers recap an epic 30 day adventure through the Canadian Bush.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E07 - Operation Summer Recreation
programme.desc: Were close to Seeley Lake, Montana, where the wardens from Region 2 have their hands full with the summer visitors.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E03 - Salvage: Gone-Awry
programme.desc: Joel and Mark Barker tempt fate and fly into no mans land to find and salvage a white airplane in a snowy forest all while fighting hypothermia along the way.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E12 - French Foreign Legion
programme.desc: No country other than France operates an elite military force that invites foreign nationals to serve in its ranks. With a reputation for being a safe haven for individuals with questionable pasts, the French Foreign Legion is a true mercenary army that has garnered significant respect within the global special operations community. This episode of CQB examines a raid by the Foreign Legion on a small airport in Iraq during the 1990 Gulf War, exploring the nature of the Legion, how it differs from other special forces, and how it prepares for a wide variety of close quarter battle scenarios in conflict situations around the world.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E04 - The Bears that Couldnt Be
programme.desc: Temperate Rain Forest. Jim and Corey search for an epic hunting spot deep in the coastal rain forest of Vancouver Island that Jim last explored 20 years ago.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E07 - William And Kate Into The Future
programme.desc: From a regular student to a royal girlfriend, Kate Middleton has transformed into a real-life princess. In less than ten years, this everyday girl with a normal background captured her princes heart and is now on track to become the future Queen of England.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E06 - Princess Dianas Legacy
programme.desc: Reflecting on Dianas legacy, this show delves into what Princess Diana left behind after her sudden passing - the impression she left on her children, the royal family, and the people who loved her. The young princes drew admiration with their demeanor at her funeral, but many questioned how their bond with Prince Charles would be moving forward.

programme.title: Dropped - S08:E01 - Back In The Brooks
programme.desc: For the first time in years, the Keefer Brothers set foot on the gravel roads of remote Alaska.

programme.title: Dropped - S08:E02 - Maniac Mountain
programme.desc: More than ten years on, Maniac Mountain gives the brothers another groundbreaking achievement.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E08 - Operation Rocky Mountain Front
programme.desc: During hunting season, game wardens stay on their toes by catching poachers with an elk decoy, tracking down trespassers, and checking hunting tags.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E04 - Heaven at 5000 Feet
programme.desc: Pilot Josiah Freeman takes a professional snowboarder Mark Barajas to the top of the Chugach Mountains for some hellacious heli-skiing.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E13 - Hunt and Capture Saddam Hussein
programme.desc: Ten years ago, thousands of US and Coalition forces personnel, ranging from elite soldiers to reservists, found themselves in the middle of two conflicts that required an entirely different approach to warfare than they had previously experienced. From special forces units securing vital points of strategic interest and capturing key individuals in Afghanistan. This episode of CQB takes a close look at how special operations were integrated into regular units and how they fought through many close quarter combat situations with a combination of intelligence, high-tech weaponry and surveillance technologies to find and capture Saddam Hussein.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - S02:E03 - Just-Terry-Fied
programme.desc: Terry and Larry put the show Justified to the test.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - S02:E04 - Terrys Reindeer Game
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test the scene from Reindeer Games where Ben Affleck and Charlize Theron get trapped under a frozen lake and escape by shooting three shots with a 12-gauge shotgun underwater to blast a hole in the ice to escape.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E05 - Life and Death
programme.desc: Temperate Rain Forest Pt2. Jim comes face to face with a monster black bear in the coastal rain forest of the Pacific Northwest.

programme.desc: The story of an extraordinary woman and her incredible life.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E02 - Horses Can Think...Rafts Cant
programme.desc: In episode two, Casey continues where they left off. Theyre faced with a choice. Once theyve settled into a risky spot on the mountain, they see that the ram they were after isnt legal to hunt, so they have to retreat.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E03 - Band of Ten
programme.desc: The crew reaches a canyon where they find a group of ten rams. After the thrill of the first wave, they quickly become disappointed and frustrated when none of the rams are legally suitable.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E04 - Now or Never
programme.desc: As the mist drifts past the craggy top of Fish Hook, the crews shapes slowly come into view right where the ram had been resting. Did they fire without Chris hearing the sound?

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E03 - Hunters Paradise
programme.desc: Catering off the grid isnt easy and the Ewing Family knows it. A group of 8 hunters will be served a beet salad followed by braised venison and for desert cheesecake with lingonberries.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E04 - Celebration
programme.desc: Another 5 Star meal from the Ewing Family. This time it is a dinner for some local natives. Bradley decides to go on a hunt for a goat for the first course of slow braised goat ragout, followed by a fish risotto, and for the main course - curried goat with apple and rose hip chutney and to complete the dinner a chocolate molten lava cake for desert.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E05 - Fishermans Catch
programme.desc: Bradley is looking to give a group of fishermen an unusual dinner - something totally unexpected. On the menu: sea snails followed by an ambitious sea cucumber dish and for the main course a Dungeness Crab Risotto.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E06 - Alutiq Anniversary
programme.desc: Its Game On for the Ewing Family as they plan a dinner to celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the AlutIq Museum. On the menu: clam fritters with kelp, kelp with rhubarb and cranberry jam, game meat with horse-radish mash potatoes with mushrooms, asparagus and leeks. The challenge is on to produce a memorable dinner from local ingredients for the Alutiq people and presenting it in a way that they have never had it before.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E07 - Bush Pilots Birthday
programme.desc: A Bush Pilots Birthday warrants a treat of a menu with pacific spot prawns and pasta to kick off this episodes menu followed by duck breast with celery root and for the main course there is rabbit and carrots.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E05 - Ron Smith Story
programme.desc: The true story of Ron Smiths encounter with a fearless deer that attacked both him and his nephew, Arik, while out fishing.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E06 - Jackson Jordan
programme.desc: This episode features Jackson Jordon and his narrow escape from death in the woods of Georgia after an attack from a pack of coyotes when he was only 16.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E07 - Mischelle Hileman
programme.desc: This week, Mischelle Hileman finds herself deep in the Oregon wilderness on an elk hunt when she gets lost, injured and on the brink of death.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E08 - The Rick Collins Story
programme.desc: A father and son set out on a cliff side sheep hunt, but one slip could mean life or death in this remote and unforgiving area.

programme.title: Home for a Royal Heart
programme.desc: When the seaside town of Shaw Bay is under threat of a redevelopment, realtor Erin will do anything to save it. Cue the handsome Theo, a royal looking for a new property. The catch is, hes hiding the royal part.

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, where she soon finds herself mentoring a handsome BAndB owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.title: Falling for the Competition
programme.desc: Molly runs the local moms group and this year theyre entering the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year Contest. When a new to town dad, Ashley, sets up a rival dads group, their competitive natures cause competition in town.

programme.title: Here Kills the Bride
programme.desc: Inspired by the Highly Acclaimed Thriller - The Perfect Bride Jessica is shocked to find out that her brother, Carlos, is getting married in a week to Grace, a girl he just met in a strip club, something he would never regularly do. Determined to find out the real reasons behind the marriage, Jessica gets pulled into a whirlwind of events, putting her own life at risk. Is Carlos in trouble? Or is Grace a victim?
